        'At Cost' Pricing 
        Regular prices for domain registrations are: 
        .COM: $8.53/yr. per domain 
        .NET: $9.67/yr. per domain 
        Save with 'at cost' pricing:

        To get ‘at cost’ pricing on your domain registrations, simply pre-fund your NameBright  account via bank wire or check, 
        then select the “Bill My Funded NameBright Account” in the payment method at checkout. To learn more,  click here .
 Transfer a domain to NameBright. 
 Bulk Transfers 
            Transfer with ease! Use our  transfer wizards  to transfer up to 5,000 domains.
                We’ve built NameBright from the ground up to make transfers easier than they have ever been before! Our transfer wizards help you by telling you exactly what’s going on, what is needed next, and letting you know how long each step of the process will take.
 Scalable and secure domain products. 
 Email Forwarding   $FREE 
 Privacy Protection   1yr  $FREE  * 
 Domain History   $FREE  * 
 Get your domain online in minutes. 
 See All Features 
        Privacy Protection is free for the first year of registration.  Regular privacy charges, which are $2.95 per year, will apply in subsequent years unless you remove privacy protection from the domain within the first 365 days.
        Domain History is free for the last 30 days.  To see more data you will have to  upgrade your domain .  With an upgraded domain you will see domain history as far back as it has been registered with NameBright.com

        Find something that is not working right?

        We would really appreciate your support.
        If you find NameBright useful please like us on Facebook to help spread the word.
        Click the blue icon to like us.
 Become a Follower! 
        You can follow us on Twitter to get special promotions, deals and offers we will put out there from time to time.
 Read Our Blog! 
        Our blog covers everything from features, has news stories about domain names and domain management.
        It is also the one place we will post information about downtimes or service outages.

 What Does "Copy" Do? 
This is a feature that helps you manage domain names in bulk.  By copying a list of domains you can easily import into Excel, or send yourself a list as a reminder.  It is a convenience for people that manage multiple domain names.
